text: Cave Creek is a subterranean river in Boone County in the U.S. state of Missouri. The area of the stream is just west of Missouri Route 163 and about one half mile northwest of Pierpont.Ashland, Missouri, 7.5 Minute Topographic Quadrangle, USGS, 1969 (1982 rev.) (note: location per the coordinates given by GNIS) Cave Creek was named for the fact it flows through a cave. It is located in Rock Bridge State Park. ==See also== *List of rivers of Missouri ==References== Category:Rivers of Boone County, Missouri Category:Rivers of Missouri Category:Subterranean rivers of the United States
title: Cave Creek (Boone County)
